meta.title: About us - Edu.turkish
meta.description: Edu.turkish is a team that helps students get admitted to universities in Turkey. 5+ years of experience, 1000+ successful admissions.

hero.title: About us
hero.subtitle: Edu.turkish is a team that helps students get admitted to universities in Turkey

who_we_are.title: Who we are
who_we_are.subtitle: We are an educational agency with years of experience specializing in admission to Turkish universities
who_we_are.experienced_agency_desc: 6+ years of successful work in educational consulting. We know all the nuances of admission to Turkish universities.
who_we_are.students_enrolled_desc: Over the years, we have helped more than 500 students from CIS countries get into the best universities in Turkey.
who_we_are.official_work_desc: All our services are provided on the basis of an official contract with clear guarantees and obligations.
who_we_are.comprehensive_help_desc: Comprehensive support from document preparation to obtaining a residence permit.

team.title: Our team
team.subtitle: Professionals who know everything about admission to Turkish universities
team.ceo_founder: Founder and head of the agency
team.aliya_description: Graduate of Bogazici University. 8+ years of experience in educational consulting. Helped 500+ students to enroll.
team.dmitry_description: Bachelor's programs specialist. Graduate of METU Ankara. Speaks Turkish, English and Russian.
team.aigul_description: Expert in master's and doctoral programs. Graduate of Istanbul University. Specializes in medical fields.
team.mehmet_description: Coordinates work with admission committees of Turkish universities. Lives in Istanbul, has direct connections with universities.
team.anna_description: Responsible for document preparation and translation. Legal education, 6 years of experience with educational documents.
team.artem_description: Responsible for 24/7 student support. Always ready to answer questions in WhatsApp, Telegram and other messengers.

guarantees.title: Our guarantees
guarantees.subtitle: We take responsibility for the result and guarantee the quality of our services
guarantees.contract_work_desc: All services are provided on the basis of an official contract with clear conditions and guarantees
guarantees.transparent_terms_desc: No hidden fees. All expenses are discussed in advance and fixed in the contract
guarantees.full_support_desc: From the first consultation to obtaining a visa and adaptation at the university
guarantees.fast_response: We respond quickly and in English
guarantees.fast_response_desc: 24/7 support in WhatsApp and Telegram. Response within 30 minutes during business hours
guarantees.admission_guarantee_desc: If we cannot help you get into your chosen university due to our fault, we will refund 100% of the service cost

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: The journey from an idea to a leading educational agency for admission to Turkish universities
story.imageAlt: History of Edu.turkish development - from a small startup to a leading agency

step1.title: The Beginning (2019)
step1.description: Founded the company with the goal of helping CIS students enroll in Turkish universities

step2.title: First Successes (2020)
step2.description: Helped the first 50 students enroll, established relationships with key universities

step3.title: Scaling (2021-2022)
step3.description: Expanded the team, opened an office in Istanbul, increased the number of partner universities

step4.title: Leadership (2023-2024)
step4.description: Became one of the leading agencies, helped more than 1000 students enroll

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Unique advantages of working with Edu.turkish
whyChooseUs.imageAlt: Happy students with Turkish university acceptance letters

personal.title: Personal Approach
personal.description: Each applicant receives a personal consultation, and we define an individual admission plan to Turkey, taking all requests into account.

direct.title: Direct University Connections
direct.description: Direct contacts with universities ensure fast review of our students' documents.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Our team speaks Russian, Turkish and English at a professional level.

support.title: Support at all stages
support.description: After full settling-in, we help our students adapt during the first 6 months.

database.title: Unique Database
database.description: Over the years, we have compiled a unique database of requirements for all Turkish universities, application deadlines, admission features and secrets of successful enrollment.
database.exclusive: Exclusive information not available in public access

contact.title: How to Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are always ready to answer your questions and help with admission
